info.title: OpenVista Common Data Set API
info.description:
**Patient Data For Apps - OpenVista Release 2**

© 2017 Medsphere Systems Corporation. All rights reserved.

tags.name: Patients
tags.description: Find accessible patients. Retrieve CCDA and Common Data Set information.

tags.name: API Users
tags.description: Create and manage API Users and control access to patients.

get.summary: Find accessible patients, filtered by various fields.
get.description: If no query parameters are provided, a list of all accessible patients is returned. *see also* /patients/findbymrn/{mrn} to retrieve patients by medical record number.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Patient name.

parameters.name: dob
parameters.description: Patient's date of birth in ISO-8601 format.

parameters.name: mrn
parameters.description: Patient Medical Record Number.

get.summary: Find a single accessible patient by medical record number (mrn).
Get a list of visits and care team members for a patient.

parameters.name: dfn
parameters.description: Patient ID

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Find information for visits starting at or after this date-time.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Find information for visits ending before this date-time

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Find information for visits occuring on this date.

get.description: The visit list includes the care team for each visit. *Hint:* Use visits to determine which time periods have documents and data available for a patient.

get.summary: Get a CCDA for a specific patient visit.

parameters.name: dfn
parameters.description: Patient ID **Should be external ID?**

parameters.name: visitId
parameters.description: Return a CCDA for this Visit ID number.

get.description: Return a CCDA in XML machine readable form for the specified visit.

parameters.name: dfn
parameters.description: Patient External ID

get.description: Return patient allergies. All active allergies are returned.

parameters.name: dfn
parameters.description: Patient External ID

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Find information for visits starting at or after this date-time.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Find information for visits ending before this date-time

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Find information for visits occuring on this date.

get.description: Assessment is a visit based data collection. Requests for assessment between two dates are grouped by visit and returned in a json object keyed by visit IEN. This allows you to use the visit ien along with other data elements that are visit based.

parameters.name: dfn
parameters.description: Patient External ID

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Find information for visits starting at or after this date-time.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Find information for visits ending before this date-time

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Find information for visits occuring on this date.

get.description: Care plan is a visit based data collection. Requests for care plan between two dates are grouped by visit and returned in a json object keyed by visit IEN. This allows you to use the visit ien along with other data elements that are visit based.

parameters.description: Find information for visits starting at or after this date-time.

parameters.name: to

parameters.name: date

get.description: Implantable devices is a current data element. Entire content is always returned.

get.description: Return current patient medications in json form.

parameters.name: dfn
parameters.description: Patient External ID

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return medications starting at this time.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return medications ending at this time.

parameters.name: dfn
parameters.description: Patient External ID

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Define beginning of time period. Current problems are always returned.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Define end of time period. Current problems are always returned.

parameters.name: dfn
parameters.description: Patient External ID

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return procedures starting with this time.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return procedures ending with this time.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Return procedures occurring on this date.

get.description: Smoking status as recorded during visits within the requested time period.

parameters.name: dfn
parameters.description: Patient External ID

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Find information for visits starting at or after this date-time.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Find information for visits ending before this date-time

parameters.name: date

parameters.name: dfn
parameters.description: Patient External ID

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return vitals starting at this time.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return vitals ending at this time.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Return vitals from this date.

get.description: Return a CCDA in XML machine readable form for the specified visit.

Response Wrapper.description: This structure wraps every data response from the API, except the full data CCDA response, which simply returns a CCDA as application/xml. The response data is found in the property named content:.

timestamp.description: Time of the response in epoch time.

url.description: The request url that produced the response.

apiUser.description: External ID of the user who made the request.

content.description: This property contains the data content of the request as json object with named categories such as vitals, careplan, problems.

id.description: Unique Identifier for the patient. **Remove this?**

externalId.description: External Unique Identifier for the patient.

message.description: A reasonably short message potentially appropriate to show to users or technical support.

detail.description: When present, a longer message with details appropriate for technical support or developers.

logid.description: When present, an error reference number that may be helpful when discussing a problem with Medsphere.

Accessible Patients.description: This is the return resource of the current request.

timestamp.description: Time, when the response was sent in epoch time format.

url.description: The url used to request this response.

name.description: The First,Last name of the patient.

Allergies.description: This is the return resource of the current request.

timestamp.description: Time, when the response was sent in epoch time format.

url.description: The url used to request this response.

content.description: This is the content of the resource object.

apiuser.description: The external unique id of the user.

patientDfn.description: Unique id for patient. Same as patient ien.

Visit.description: List of visits for requested dates. Date range is based on visit date which is admission date for inpatient visits.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the current request in epoch format.

name.description: The Patient's First and Last name.

apiuser.description: The external unique id of the user.
